headline: President Trump rose to power following a simple creed in moments of crisis: Cede no ground, never admit mistakes and attack. Now he and his aides are rushing to limit political damage as they point fingers and shift strategy in Minnesota.
Trump warns Iran 'time is running out' for nuclear deal as US military builds up in Gulf
AI image of Alex Pretti’s killing is the latest altered photo amid ICE surge in Minneapolis
Google co-founder Sergey Brin has contributed $20 million to a new effort aimed at tackling housing affordability in California, one of his largest and most visible political contributions

President Trump said the White House is moving toward a deal with Senate Democrats that could avert a government shutdown, though any agreement that clears the Senate would still have to be passed by the House
Democratic Sen. Amy Klobuchar of Minnesota announced she will run for state governor after Gov. Tim Walz said earlier this month that he would not seek a third term
FBI agents searched an election office in Fulton County, Ga., a site that was a focus of President Trump in his effort to overturn his 2020 presidential loss
Fed Chair Jerome Powell’s decision on whether to remain on the central bank’s board after his chairmanship ends is the last and only card he holds against the Trump administration
Rudy Giuliani trashes Mamdani’s NYC homeless policy after 10 found dead during blistering cold: ‘Reckless disregard for human life’
Trump prevents ‘boring’ cabinet meeting so he doesn’t fall asleep, avoids Minnesota talk, Kristi Noem
